page.title: 18The Frogmill Inn Today
page.content: Today the Frogmill Inn looks extremely grand and is set in about 3 acres of land.The River Coln runs through the grounds and it is possible to sit outside on the patio eating your lunch and admiring the view over the Cotswolds.The original building is incorporated with many new extensions. There are various bars including the Waterwheel Bar with an old water wheel that turns.A dining room that can sit 100 people and a banqueting hall which can accommodate 200 people.The latest addition is a heli-port to take guests to the races in Cheltenham.Five people are employed full-time and ten part-time.There are various excellent menus to choose from varying in prices from 7.50 to 15.00 per person and as a result the Frogmill is now one of the most popular hotels in Gloucestershire.
